name: Walid Ra'ad

roles_in_work.title: The Dead Weight of a Quarrel Hangs
The Dead Weight of a Quarrel Hangs

biography: Walid Raad is a media astist and an Assistant Professor of Art at Cooper Union in New York, whose works include textual analysis, video, perofrmance and photography projects. He is also a memeber of the Arab Image Foundation (Beirut/New York) and founding member of the Atlas Group.
